thread.title: McDonald's rolling out chocolate Shamrock Shake for first time ever
thread.title_full: McDonald's rolling out chocolate Shamrock Shake for first time ever | Fox News

author: kristen leanne (@kristenleannehair) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:07am PST Advertisement
title: McDonald's rolling out chocolate Shamrock Shake for first time ever
text:
Published February 03, 2017 FoxNews.com It's green, sweet, vaguely minty-- and chock full of calories . But year after year, diehard fans can't seem to get enough of McDonald's Shamrock Shake.
In the weeks leading up to St. Patrick‚Äôs Day, McDonald‚Äôs brings back its beloved mean, green icy beverage for a limited time.
But this year, the frothy drink is back with a few twists.
Brand Eating reports that participating McDonald‚Äôs restaurants are planning to debut not one, but five different variations of the Shamrock Shake on their McCaf√© menus, including the original Shamrock Shake, a Chocolate Shamrock Shake, a Shamrock Chocolate Chip Frapp√©, a Shamrock Hot Chocolate and a Shamrock Mocha.
WHAT'S REALLY IN A SHAMROCK SHAKE?
As Consumerist notes, McDonald's minty new offerings may have actually been inspired by items frequently ordered off their "secret menu" by Shamrock Shake enthusiasts, e.g., a hot chocolate with mint syrup, or a half-chocolate-half-Shamrock Shake.
See more info on each new beverage below:
--The original Shamrock Shake features vanilla soft serve, mint syrup, whipped topping, but this year it may come with a sprinkle of granulated green sugar and a cherry.
-- The new Chocolate Shamrock Shake consists of half a chocolate shake (on the bottom) and half a Shamrock Shake (ayered on top.
--The Shamrock Chocolate Chip Frapp√© is a mocha frappe with whipped topping, green sugar and a drizzle of chocolate syrup.
--The Shamrock Hot Chocolate, like McDonald‚Äôs original hot chocolate, is a blend of milk and chocolate syrup, but with the addition of mint syrup, too.
--The Shamrock Mocha, another hot beverage, is similar to the Hot Chocolate, but comes up with a shot espresso.
According to Brand Eating, McDonald‚Äôs latest Shamrock beverages are already available in select locations, but Instagram evidence points to a wider roll-out on Feb. 7.
I can't stand the food, but the #shamrockshake is definitely my all time favorite. Counting down these next 7 days! ‚òòÔ∏èüçÄüòç
